system.Gadget.descr: Group Management(Equipment, customers, users, and are grouped together.)
system.Gadget.name: Group Management

system.Gadget.descr: Power Fail Restore Alarm Line Missing Alarm
system.Gadget.name: Power Alarm Log

system.DeviceVendor.name: NURITelecom

device.EventAlert.name: Threshold Warning
device.EventAlert.msgPattern: Kind=[$(event.eventAttrs.kind)] Threshold Usage=[$(event.eventAttrs.observedValue)] crossed the defined value[$(event.eventAttrs.thresholdValue)]

device.EventAlert.name: Power Alarm
device.EventAlert.descr: Power Failure, Restore or Massive and Line Missing or Restore

device.EventAlert.name: Meter Value Alarm
device.EventAlert.descr: Meter Value Incorrect or Illegal, Meter Read Fail

device.EventAlert.name: Equipment Registration
device.EventAlert.descr: equipment is created automatically or installed.

device.EventAlert.name: Equipment Notification
device.EventAlert.descr: Equipment Notification, Information, Warning or etc..

device.EventAlert.name: EnergyLevelChanged
device.EventAlert.descr: Energy Level of Meter is changed

device.EventAlert.name: Equipment Replacement
device.EventAlert.descr: The modem(or meter) connected to the meter(modem) has been replaced by another meter(modem).
device.EventAlert.msgPattern: Device Type=[$(event.eventAttrs.equipType)] old [$(event.eventAttrs.oldEquipID)] replaced to new [$(event.eventAttrs.newEquipID)]
